title: Sharp Humanistic Sans Serif Font
content:
Any help recognising this font would be much appreciated. The spacing is not accurate to the original font but I'm hoping the letter shape might give it away.

The text reads: Paro Dwylo

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317062045im_/http:/typophile.com/files/example_5255.png)

Thanks!

Font: 

 Gill Sans (thin weight) 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317062045/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [example.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317062045/http:/typophile.com/files/example_2.png) | 2.67 KB |
author: Larry Ahmeen

comments.content:
[Gill Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317062045/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/gill-sans)  
Note that the [Hellenic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317062045/http:/www.fonts.com/font/cannibal/gill-sans-hellenic/family-pack) version offers a Thin weight.
